MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
On our way back to the base at the academy after completing a mission,
the train comes to an abrupt halt for different reasons.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Kyaah!? Hey, if you're going to stop, say you're going to stop!
Oh no, my ice cream fell on the floor!

Alexandra, the only member of the SSS accompanying me on this mission, is screaming. She grew up in the desert of Flamarine and possesses special skills, making her the perfect person for a mission in this region of swirling hot sand.
But perhaps because of her background, she hates the desert, which is also known as the Land of the Dead. It was quite difficult to get her to accompany me on this mission.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ahhh, I was looking forward to it! It's a rather expensive ice cream made by Kuala Lum's company and you have to queue up to get it, but I was given a special deal!
Actaully, that ice cream was also specially obtained by the authority of the "conductor". As long as we don't run out of ice cream, Alexandra is a good sport, but...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's impossible! You'll take responsibility, right, Conductor? You're going to serve me the same thing twice, no, three times a day! And wipe up the dirty floor!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: H-huh? Conductor? What's the matter, you look scary...?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
A-are you mad? I was out of line, too.
You don't have to be so grumpy.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ohhh, fine! There's still some ice cream left, so I'll let you off the hook for this one time, and you should thank me! And I'll wipe up the dirty floor myself.

...Oh, sorry. I was just thinking.
What did you say, Alexandra?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Huh?
You should listen to what people have to say and always put me first!
Sorry, my bad. Sorry to repeat myself, but we've got a bit of a problem. Look―there's some kind of mountain-like thing sitting on top of the tracks, and we can't go any further.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Mountain? Oh, the pyramids?
There's plenty of those in the deserts of Flamarine, you know.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
That's funny~ You're surprised to see something like that?
Conductor, is this your first time to see the pyramids?

I'd seen them from the car window from time to time, and had some knowledge of the literature. This is the first time I've seen one so close up, though― Is it really man-made? It's amazing. It's magnificent.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's just a bunch of stones, and the decorations have been stolen by tomb robbers, so it's poor and raggedy...I don't like it. I don't care about the pyramids, let's go home.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Look, there's only a few minutes left on the cooling spell! I don't want to go home a steaming pile of mush from the hot desert! I hate the desert. I hate being in the desert!

You were born here.
I don't think you should talk about it like that.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's why! People from other parts of the world seem to have some kind of romantic notion of the desert, but it's hot during the day, cold at night, there's nothing but sand, and it's prone to Phantom Mist.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: This is no place for a human being to live! I like the glittering city a hundred times better than the desert! So let's go home! I'm tired of this! I'm tired!
But, as you can see, the pyramid is covering the railroad tracks, so it's not possible to pass through. It's a little difficult and time-consuming, but I guess we'll have to turn back.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
What? No, no! I'm going home!
Why don't we just destroy the pyramid and keep going?
No, it would be dangerous. The pyramids are said to be chunks of stone, and if they fall, even the Mist Train is likely to be wrecked. There's not much reason to hurry, so let's be careful.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: What's more important to you, me or the train!?

Don't ask hard questions...
I'm sorry, but you'll have to bear with me this time, Alexandra.

Alexandra makes a wonderfully puffed up face
and suddenly opens the car window and jumps out.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Enough! You don't want the train to break, do you?
Then I'll gouge out the pyramid and build a tunnel for the train to pass through!
Wait, wait. That's easy to say, but it would take an enormous amount of time to build a tunnel that would allow trains to pass through. Don't get mad and think irrationally, come back.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Huh? Can't you see it, the tunnel's been there all along! Right now, it looks like the entrance and exit are just blocked by a big rock, and if we gouge it out, we'll be able to get through!
Oh, really?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Absolutely! That's what it says!
Conductor, can't you read hieroglyphics?

I didn't learn that in school.
I believe it was the script of an ancient dynasty in Flamarine?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's right. My parents made me learn because if you can't read warning signs, you might get trapped and die.

I see.
You're the perfect person for desert missions.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I told you I hate the desert! Just make sure the train is ready to go! I'll clear a path quickly!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Dig, dig, dig~♪
As she speaks, Alexandra gouges out a large rock with a special weapon she possessed― a drill-like spear that is somehow marked with the word "chew" in Nishiki script.

The huge rocks are destroyed as soon as they touch "chew".
The rocks are absorbed by the drill and expelled from the inside with the force of a geyser.
Alexandra is able to do even large scale civil engineering work single-handedly. As I watch in admiration, large rocks are removed and a tunnel-like hole is created, just as she had said.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Pfft, I'm covered in mud! This is the worst! Is that better? The train can go through now, right?

Yeah, thank you.
Well done, Alexandra, get back on the train.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Yeah...No, wait a minute.
Huh~ what's this?
What? What's going on?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hmm~...Maybe I'm wrong. And since I'm sweating so much, get me a chilled wet towel and some ice cream! Kyahaha♪
Continue to Episode 2.
